name: Waste Slayer
description:
Decapitate capitalism! Play as the hippie avenger, whose goal is to slay anything related to the consumerism that corrupts our world. But beware of the good props you want to keep in one piece!

Features: 

  • A juicy Fruit Ninja-like game!
  • Increasing difficulty, props to avoid!
  • The ability to uncensor the game and really see what (or who?) you cut!

|| CREDITS:
